description: A GNOME Shell extension that provides a chatbot interface using various LLM providers, including Anthropic, OpenAI, Gemini, and OpenRouter. Features include multiple provider support, customizable models, chat history, customizable appearance, a keyboard shortcut, web search, location (by using the extension, you consent to sharing your location with OpenRouter for AI Tools) and copy-to-clipboard functionality.
